name: Timenim

This is now our pizza of choice and this is a great location to get it. Very ‚Ä¶More

text: Gave me the wrong size pizza and incorrect pizza because they took the order incorrectly. I asked for them to fix it and they asked me to drive back around to pay an extra $2.00. I was shocked because this was their mistake. The manager, ‚Ä¶More

name: Torri Peacock
text: I'll be quick and brief with this survey. The pizza was some of the best I've had in this particular area. They have the best crust that just hits the spot. The sauce and toppings were great as well. Absolutely love the pizza.

name: Phyllis Hager
text: The employees were amazingly helpful. But I was informed the store was closing and that is not good. We go there often and will miss it. The pizzas were excellent.

name: Morgan Robinson
text: I really wish I didn‚Äôt have such a terrible experience because I would really like to order from here again.  But I called and ordered 2 large pineapple and pepperoni pizzas.  The manager at this location took my order and said ‚Äúoh the ‚Ä¶More

name: Jordan Ferguson
text: I was helped by a worker named Joseph. He provided some of the best customer service I have ever had. He went above and beyond to help me with any questions I had. Companies pay a lot of money to acquire workers with ‚Ä¶More

name: Stella Rochelle
text: Good pizza and quick serving. Super good crust and tasty.  Lots of different topping options.  We ordered the house pizza and it was loaded with toppings.  They definitely aren't stingy with them.  It was a good price for good pizza.

name: Bro. Haulin
text: Top notch food.  Service.  I have never had a bad experience at this location.  A go to for pizza nights.

name: christine headrick
text: I just found out they left 71st and Lynn Lane! I miss them already. Best pizza in town!

name: L Slone
text: Papa Murphy's never disappoints! Every pizza, every time is so wonderfully delicious! Their extras never disappoint either - cheesy breads, salads, sweet treats - it's ALL so good!!

name: J Cope
text: First of all terrible management, straight up. I was a former employee here and they treat you like a number and keep rotating new people in and out. They ask themselves (Fran Holloway, owner and Aaron, store manager) ‚Äúwhy can‚Äôt we keep ‚Ä¶More

name: Kaye Foster
text: Love there customer service and there pizzas. A++ FOR THERE CINNAMON PIZZA.

name: Katrice Werner
text: Just went again to these guys...they are my new favorite pizza place. Always really fast and excellent pizza! A winning combo! Very happy all around!

name: Mat Crew
text: The owner is so nice.  The food is always served fresh.  Try the cookie dough and salads also!! A family favorite for family night movie night.
